mapper.select: SELECT SEQ, MEM_NAME, MEM_ID, BOARD_SUBJECT, REG_DATE, UPT_DATE, VIEW_CNT FROM BOARD_STUDY ORDER BY SEQ DESC
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO BOARD_STUDY (SEQ, MEM_NAME, MEM_ID, BOARD_SUBJECT, BOARD_SUBJECT, REG_DATE, UPT_DATE, VIEW_CNT, USEYN) VALUES ((SEQ.NEXTVAL+1), #{memName} , #{memId}, #{title}, #{boardContent}, SYSDATE, NULL, 0, NULL )
mapper.update: UPDATE BOARD_STUDY SET VIEW_CNT = NVL(VIEW_CNT, 0) + 1 WHERE SEQ = #{seq}
